A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm giving it one star for the special effects. Not even the music can save this piece of garbage. We've heard it 8 times already. Complete disrespect to fans of the franchise and one of the worst attempts at \"filmmaking\" in history. Never have we seen someone try not only to destroy plot points from the previous movie in a trilogy but also do his best to make it as hard as possible for the next movie to follow up. An objectively bad movie both from the standpoint of fan service and entertainment. China appropriately phrased it as \"insulting to their intelligence\". Disney should focus on quality management instead of calling those who dislike the movie \"sexists\".
